data.name: DeletePersonProgram
data.value: delete from CKT_PERSON_PROGRAM where (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (CREATED_TIMESTAMP = @createdTimestamp) and (PRG_GENERATED_ID = @prgGeneratedId)

data.name: ReadCsePerson
data.value: select top(1) NUMB from CKT_CSE_PERSON where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadCsePersonAccount
data.value: select top(1) CSP_NUMBER, TYPE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, RECOMP_BAL_FROM_DT from CKT_CSE_PERSON_ACC where (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (TYPE = 'S')

data.name: ReadPersonProgram
data.value: select top(1) CSP_NUMBER, EFFECTIVE_DATE, CLOSURE_REASON, ASSIGNED_DATE, DISCONTINUE_DATE, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATD_TSTAMP, PRG_GENERATED_ID from CKT_PERSON_PROGRAM where (@prgGeneratedId = PRG_GENERATED_ID) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (CREATED_TIMESTAMP = @createdTimestamp)

data.name: ReadProgram
data.value: select top(1) PROGRAM_ID, CODE, DISTRBTN_PRGM_TYPE from CKT_PROGRAM where CODE = @code

data.name: UpdateCsePersonAccount
data.value: update CKT_CSE_PERSON_ACC set LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, LAST_UPDATED_TMST = @lastUpdatedTmst, RECOMP_BAL_FROM_DT = @recompBalFromDt where (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (TYPE = @type)
